short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ability is a browser extension that helps people with varying degrees of ability have more control over their browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a comprehensive collection of assistive tools for individuals with various levels of ability or challenges. It is designed to empower the user to access the web in a more personally tailored way. It provides a range of features including text-to-speech, speech-to-text, image hiding, high contrast mode, image magnification, text input autocomplete, dyslexia-friendly font injection, etc. This collection of tools was designed keeping in mind individuals with sensory sensitivities, dyslexia, epilepsy, visual & mobility impairments, and intellectual disabilities. The features will continue to grow as more needs are discovered. See the list of upcoming features in the readme for a look at what's coming down the pipeline.
